summary: MY TRANSMISSION IS STARTING TO FAIL AT 62,000 MILES.  WHY?  MY WATER PUMP WAS RECENTLY REPLACED.  THEN MY ENGINE LIGHT WENT ON AND THE PLUGS AND WIRES HAD TO BE REPLACED AND THE MECHANIC TOLD ME THE TRANSMISSION IS STARING TO GO.  I HAVE NOTICED THAT THE ENGINE IS RACING BUT THE CAR IS HAVING A DIFFICULT TIME KEEPING UP WITH THE ENGINE.  SURE SIGN.
